description.zh-CN: CRT监视器扫描线效果，采用霓虹发光和RGB色差。创造真实复古街机视觉和怀旧氛围。，创造真实复古街机视觉和沉浸式怀旧氛围。CRT监视器扫描线效果搭配霓虹光晕和RGB色差。创造真实街机复古美学。
description.en-US: CRT monitor scanline effects with neon glow and RGB chromatic aberration creating authentic arcade visual aesthetics. Captures the essence of classic video game displays with analog distortion and retro technology aesthetics Evokes nostalgic gaming experiences and retro-futuristic aesthetics Ideal for gaming applications, entertainment platforms, and nostalgia-driven content This design approach offers a distinctive visual language suitable for modern applications. It combines aesthetic principles with functional design elements to create compelling user experiences. authentic nostalgic retro gaming aesthetics. Excellence in design.
